p: Microbial analysis and antioxidant capacity results of pork chorizo are presented in Table 3. Mesophyll counts were not different statistically between treatments ( p > .05), but there was an effect ( p < .05) with storage days, with values for T1 and T2, respectively, being higher at d 7 than at d 1. Treatments had no statistical effect ( p > .05) on DPPH; however, pork chorizo treated with MOO (T2) had a slightly higher mean value compared to the control (T1).
